question: The government of Maharashtra approved the auto-rickshaws “happy hours” by reducting what percent of fare prices from 12 pm to 4 pm?
explanation: A reduction of 15% of fare prices is approved by the government of Maharashtra during auto-rickshaws “happy hours” from 12 pm to 4 pm. The provision was recommended by the Khatua panel. The panel had also recommended the same discount for conventional taxis and app-based cabs but it was not approved.
